auth_info.name: GitHub Personal Access Token
auth_info.description: GitHub API token with gist permission

auth_guide.title: GitHub Personal Access Token Setup
steps: Log in to your GitHub account
Go to Settings > Developer Settings > Personal access tokens > Tokens (classic)
Click Generate new token and select Generate new token (classic)
Name your token and select the gist permission
Click Generate token and copy your token
Enter the token during the MCP installation process
